casebody.data:
The SALTEX LOOMS, Inc., and Sidney Blumenthal & Company, Inc., Plaintiffs-Appellants-Appellees, v. COLLINS & AIKMAN CORPORATION, Defendant-Appellant-Appellee. No. 57. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Oct. 30, 1942. E. Clarkson Seward and W. Saxton Seward, both of New York City, for plaintiffs-appellants-appellees. Darby & Darby, of New York City (Samuel E. Darby, Jr., Albert R. Jube, and Walter A. Darby, all of New York City, and Paul J. Schmitz, of Philadelphia, Pa., of counsel), for defendant-appellee-appellant.

Before SWAN, AUGUSTUS N. HAND, and CLARK, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decree affirmed on opinion below, D.C., 43 F.Supp. 914.
